name: Mouse Trials
description:
Use your mouse to collect as many coins as possible before the timer runs out and without touching any walls in a procedurally generated path.

How to Play:

  1. Hover over the green square to start.
  2. Touch coins to collect.
  3. Reach the finish line to generate the next level.
  4. Collecting every coin in a level will add more time to the clock.
